languages.text: {n}За вежливой, мягкой речью женщины вы ощущаете легчайшие признаки нервозности. Кажется, будто произнесенные ей слова заучены, и она готовилась заранее к этому вопросу.{/n}
{n}Behind her polite, soft tone, you detect the slightest hint of nervousness. It is as if she is reciting a reply she has carefully prepared beforehand.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}За вежливой, мягкой речью женщины вы ощущаете легчайшие признаки нервозности. Кажется, будто произнесенные ей слова заучены, и она готовилась заранее к этому вопросу.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Behind her polite, soft tone, you detect the slightest hints of nervousness. It is as if she is reciting a reply she has carefully prepared beforehand.{/n}
{n}Behind her polite, soft tone, you detect the slightest hints of nervousness. It is as if she is reciting a reply she has carefully prepared beforehand.{/n}
{n}Behind her polite, soft tone, you detect the slightest hint of nervousness. It is as if she is reciting a reply she has carefully prepared beforehand.{/n}
{n}Behind her polite, soft tone, you detect the slightest hint of nervousness. It is as if she is reciting a reply she has carefully prepared beforehand.{/n}
{n}Behind her polite, soft tone, you detect the slightest hint of nervousness. It is as if she is reciting a reply she has carefully prepared beforehand.{/n}

languages.text: {n}丁寧で柔らかな口調の奥に、わずかな緊張感が伺える。まるで、あらかじめ用意周到に準備した返事を復唱しているかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind her polite, soft tone, you detect the slightest hint of nervousness. It is as if she is reciting a reply she has carefully prepared beforehand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}丁寧で柔らかな口調の奥に、わずかな緊張感が伺える。まるで、あらかじめ用意周到に準備した返事を復唱しているかのようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}在她礼貌、柔和的语气背后，你觉察到了一丝紧张的迹象，仿佛她在背诵事先精心准备好的回答一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind her polite, soft tone, you detect the slightest hint of nervousness. It is as if she is reciting a reply she has carefully prepared beforehand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在她礼貌、柔和的语气背后，你觉察到了一丝紧张的迹象，仿佛她在背诵事先精心准备好的回答一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tras su taimado y cortés tono de voz, detectas un sutil ápice de nerviosismo. Da la impresión de que está recitando una respuesta que tenía preparada.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind her polite, soft tone, you detect the slightest hint of nervousness. It is as if she is reciting a reply she has carefully prepared beforehand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras su taimado y cortés tono de voz, detectas un sutil ápice de nerviosismo. Da la impresión de que está recitando una respuesta que tenía preparada.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Derrière son ton calme et poli, vous remarquez une légère trace de nervosité, comme si elle récitait une réponse soigneusement préparée à l'avance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind her polite, soft tone, you detect the slightest hint of nervousness. It is as if she is reciting a reply she has carefully prepared beforehand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Derrière son ton calme et poli, vous remarquez une légère trace de nervosité, comme si elle récitait une réponse soigneusement préparée à l'avance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hinter ihrem höflichen, sanften Ton nimmst du einen Hauch von Nervosität wahr. Als würde sie eine Antwort aufsagen, die zuvor sorgfältig vorbereitet wurde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind her polite, soft tone, you detect the slightest hint of nervousness. It is as if she is reciting a reply she has carefully prepared beforehand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hinter ihrem höflichen, sanften Ton nimmst du einen Hauch von Nervosität wahr. Als würde sie eine Antwort aufsagen, die zuvor sorgfältig vorbereitet wurde.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Nazik, yumuşak ses tonunun arkasında hafif bir gerginlik seziyorsun. Sanki önceden dikkatle çalıştığı bir yanıtı tekrar ediyor gibi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Behind her polite, soft tone, you detect the slightest hint of nervousness. It is as if she is reciting a reply she has carefully prepared beforehand.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Nazik, yumuşak ses tonunun arkasında hafif bir gerginlik de sesiyorsun. Sanki önceden dikkatle çalıştığı bir yanıtı tekrar ediyor gibi.{/n}
